a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTVaricella2DoseLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Varicella.2 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a varicella vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 2-dose schedule * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTVaricella2DoseLogic

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for varicella vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

"Cient's age is more than or equal to 12 months"
"Live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks"

def.name: Client is not due for varicella vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for varicella vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first varicella dose as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first varicella dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first varicella dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first varicella dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second varicella dose as the latest varicella dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second varicella dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for varicella vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with first varicella dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first varicella dose.'
"Client is not due for varicella vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with first varicella dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first varicella dose.'
"Client is not due for varicella vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with second varicella dose as the latest varicella dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for varicella vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client with second varicella dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'

def.name: Client is due for varicella vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for varicella vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first varicella dose as no varicella dose was administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with second varicella dose as the latest varicella dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and no live vaccine was administered in past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for varicella vaccination Case 1"

'Should vaccinate client with first varicella dose as no varicella dose was administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for varicella vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with second varicella dose as the latest varicella dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and no live vaccine was administered in past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Varicella immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

a:s.a:s: "Two varicella primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two varicella primary series doses were administered

def.name: Varicella immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Varicella immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Varicella immunization schedule is complete. Two varicella primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

'Should not vaccinate client with second varicella dose as the latest varicella dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.'
